text: Robert Brown (November 17, 1926 â€“ September 19, 2022) was an American television actor. He was mostly active in the 1960s and 1970s. Brown had a starring role as the charismatic, fast-talking Jason Bolt in the ABC television series Here Come the Brides. He also starred as Carter Primus in the sea adventure television series Primus. Brown died in Ojai, California, on September 19, 2022, at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Robert Brown Profile at FocusOnTheMasters.Com Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:20th-century American actors Category:20th-century American novelists
title: Robert Brown (American actor)
